ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance Class 6: INSPIRE Interoperable Spatial Data Services metadata.
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines metadata records against the requirements for metadata in INSPIRE.

Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion.

There is a general limitation in all assertions that polymorphism and containment by reference (see the Technical Guidance, sub-clauses A.3, A.4 and A.5) are not supported. However, the current Abstract Test Suite does not support polymorphism and references either (all XPath expressions do not support polymorhism or references; in addition, schema validation is only executed against the ISO/OGC schemas without extensions). It is therefore unclear if this is really a limitation or if the sections in the technical guidance are outdated.

Source: Conformance Class 6: 'INSPIRE Interoperable Spatial Data Services metadata'

Pre-requisite conformance classes: Conformance Class 5
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for metadata XML test objects

TestCase.label: General Metadata
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for interopable services metadata records on elements that are directly child elements of the root node of the XML document: MD_Metadata node.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.1: Coordinate Reference System element
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the coordinate reference system identifiers are provided.

More information: Coordinates Reference System

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.2: Coordinate Reference System Identifier
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the default coordinate reference systems use a correct identifier.

More information: Coordinates Reference Systems HTTP URIs

TestCase.label: Identification
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for interoperable metadata records on elements that are child elements of the section of the XML document: Identification Info (property of the gmd:MD_Metadata element). This section contains information specific to the interoperable services.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.3: Conditions Applying to Access and Use
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the technical restrictions of access and use of an interoperable spatial data service are specified in the metadata.

More information: Conditions Applying to Access and Use

To fulfill this requirement, the evaluated metadata dataset shall be compliant with the following common requirements of the Technical Guide:

Common ATS (C.18): 'Conditions for Access and Use'

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.4: Responsible Party
TestAssertion.description:
Test that the interoperable spatial data service metadata contains information about the responsible party in the role of the custodian.

More information: Responsible Party

To fulfill this requirement, the evaluated metadata dataset shall be compliant with the following common requirements of the Technical Guide:

Common ATS (C.10): 'Responsible Organization'
TestAssertion.expression:
let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $party := for $x in $record/gmd:identificationInfo/srv:SV_ServiceIdentification/gmd:pointOfContact/gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty where $x/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode/@codeListValue = 'custodian' return $x return if (count($party) = 0) then local:addMessage('TR.noParty', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else for $part in $party let $role := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode let $codeList := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode/@codeList let $codeListValue := $part/gmd:role/gmd:CI_RoleCode/@codeListValue
return if (not($role)) then local:addMessage('TR.noRoleElement', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($codeListValue='custodian')) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidRoleCodeListValue', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: Data Quality
TestCase.description: Execute tests that apply for harmonised services metadata records on elements that are child elements of the section of the XML document: Data Quality Information (property of the gmd:MD_Metadata element). This section contains information specific to the quality and lineage (including processing steps and sources) of the resource.

TestAssertion.label: md sds-interoperable 6.5: Minimum estimated Quality of Service
TestAssertion.description:
Test that Quality of Service is provided correctly.

More information: Quality of Service
TestAssertion.expression:
let $messages := (for $record in $records let $rid := $record/gmd:fileIdentifier/*/text() let $results := $record/gmd:dataQualityInfo/gmd:DQ_DataQuality/gmd:report/gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency
return if (count($results) < 3) then local:addMessage('TR.wrongQualityCriteriaMultiplicity', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid, 'count': count($results)}) else for $result in $results let $measureName := $result/gmd:nameOfMeasure let $measureNameAnchor := $result/gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href let $validation1 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteria/availability') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:double','xsi:double')) and (data(./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record) >= 0) and (data(./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record) <= 100) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'urn:ogc:def:uom:OGC::percent')] let $validation2 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteria/performance') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:double','xsi:double')) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/SI/second')] let $validation3 := $result[(./gmd:nameOfMeasure/gmx:Anchor/@xlink:href = 'http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/metadata-codelist/QualityOfServiceCriteria/capacity') and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type = ('xs:integer','xsi:integer')) and (./gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href = 'http://www.opengis.net/def/uom/OGC/1.0/unity')]
let $measureDescription := $result/gmd:measureDescription
let $quantitativeResult := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult
let $valueUnit := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:valueUnit/@xlink:href let $valueRecord := $result/gmd:result/gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult/gmd:value/gco:Record/@xsi:type
return if (not($measureName)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureName', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($measureNameAnchor)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureNameAnchor', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not(($validation1) or ($validation2) or ($validation3))) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidQualityCriteria', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($measureDescription) or not(string-length($measureDescription/gco:CharacterString/text()) != 0 or string-length($measureDescription/gmx:Anchor/text()) != 0)) then local:addMessage('TR.noMeasureDescription', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($quantitativeResult)) then local:addMessage('TR.noQuantitativeResult', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($valueUnit)) then local:addMessage('TR.noValueUnit', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else if (not($valueRecord)) then local:addMessage('TR.noValueRecord', map { 'filename': local:filename($record), 'id': $rid }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
